name: Killbot 0.1
description:
Thi game was developed for Chill Game Devs Game Jam 2020 in 5 day. The theme was "Dying is good".

(Everything except the background music was made by myself)
(Background Music by Eric Skiff - Ascending https://ericskiff.com/music/)

You are a little robot in a test facility. Dying is the key to overcome obstacles and reach the next level. 

Due to lack of time and my dumb brain I couldn't come up with more levels. Sorry for that :/

Hope you enjoy!
